name: The Pyramid Robber
description:
Help Amy in her journey to find the scarab of Cleopatra and escape the dangerous pyramid.

arrows to move
space to use the sword
ctrl to open the scroll (lvl1)
mouse to drag puzzles (lvl2+lvl3)

Zohar Fridman - Dev + LVL Design

Keshet Mendicini- Dev + Producing
